props.name: iconEnd
props.docs: optionally pass an icon to display at the end of a button - accepts ui icon names

props.name: iconStart
props.docs: optionally pass an icon to display at the start of a button - accepts ui icon names

props.name: isLoading
props.docs: optionally add a sux-loader component to the button, disabling interaction.

props.name: label
props.docs: Applies to the aria-label attribute on the button or hyperlink

props.name: name
props.docs: The name attribute to apply to the button

props.name: quiet
props.docs: Is quiet makes the button appear with least prominence.

props.name: size
props.docs: specify the size of the button, defaults to m

props.name: type
props.docs: The type attribute to apply to the button

props.name: variant
props.docs: specify the appearance style of the button, defaults to solid.

events.docs: Fired when an element has lost focus

props.name: invalid
props.docs: Presentational only. Renders the Radio Group as invalid.

props.name: label
props.docs: The label of the radio group. For HTML content, use the `label` slot instead.

props.name: name
props.docs: The name of the radio group - submitted with form data. Must match the name of the radios in the group.

props.name: value
props.docs: The value of the current selected radio in the group. Changing this will also mark that radio as checked in the UI.
